title: There's a New Cyberpunk 2077 Xbox One - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.20.20
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss what a limited edition Cyberpunk 2077 Xbox One X means for the future of the console. 

Time Stamps - 
00:04:08 - Housekeeping
Thursday night at 7 pm PT, we’re having the social event of the season: Grimecraft’s Kinda Funny Animal Crossing Rave! That’s right, Grimecraft will be DJing a set in Animal Crossing for the Kinda Funny Best Friends. You can watch live -- and catch Greg interviewing Grimey after the show -- on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. But even better, you can come to the concert IN Animal Crossing. Keep an eye on Kinda Funny’s Twitter Thursday afternoon, and you can find out how to visit Grimecraft’s island and get the exclusive in-game t-shirt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:10 - The Cyberpunk 2077 Limited Edition Xbox One Has Finally Been Unveiled - Will Tuttle @ Xbox Wire
00:19:25 - Reseller bots are driving Switch shortages - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:21:25 - How difficult do you expect it to be to secure a new console preorder this year - Best Friends Q:Jamie S
00:25:52 - Travis Scott is premiering his new song in Fortnite - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:30:15 - Will other games ever start to host pop culture events of this scale, or is this sort of thing only possible in Fornite because of its accessibility and popularity? - Best Friends Q:Ricky Mcflyy
00:35:35 - We Know Where Jason Schreier is going!
00:38:28 - Seemingly new concept art for PS4 exclusive Wild surfaces online - Heather Wald @ GamesRadar
00:43:35 -  BROOKLINEN
00:45:34 - EXPRESS VPN
00:47:05 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:48:23 - With the incoming release of the next generation consoles, when do you think the PlayStation 4 and the Xbox One will receive a permanent price cut? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:51:48 - Squad Up: none
00:52:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and ImranBlessing and Imran
